description: Manual directory review of NHS Digital service catalog

services.name: Service Catalogue
services.description: Searchable catalogue of IT and digital services for health and care professionals

services.name: About Our Digital Services
services.description: Resources about NHS digital services supporting direct care, population health and business functions across health and care in England

services.name: Developer Hub
services.description: Guidance on integrating with NHS APIs and services

services.name: NHS.UK Patient Services
services.description: Main patient-facing NHS website for healthcare services

notes: Main services page acts as gateway to service catalogue
Detailed service list requires accessing the service catalogue directly
Developer hub provides API integration guidance
Services support direct care, population health, and business functions in England
recommended_next_steps: Access service catalogue with authenticated session for complete service list
Explore developer hub for API endpoints and technical documentation
Review NHS.UK for patient-facing service URLs
